alignment_score.description: Numeric score between 0 and 1 indicating how well the decision aligns with the vision.

vision.description: The company vision text provided as input.

decision.description: The decision option text provided as input.

model_name.description: Name of the deployed model, e.g., 'llama-3.1-8b-instruct-finetuned'.

version.description: Version tag or commit hash of the deployed model.

fine_tune_date.description: Date when the model was last fine-tuned.

timestamp_utc.description: UTC timestamp when the score was generated.

explanation.description: Optional natural language explanation of why the score was assigned.
